title: The Artist's Studio (August 26–28)
short_description: All visitors are invited to stop by the Ryan Learning Center and explore a drop-in studio project.
description:
All visitors are invited to stop by the Ryan Learning Center and explore a drop-in studio project.

See all upcoming dates for the Artist's Studio.

This project has been designed with social distancing in mind. Parties of visitors will be physically separated from each other, and each party will work with a separate set of supplies.

The space will close for 15 minutes periodically to refresh art materials and maintain cleanliness.
